alert.note: Alert for Maui Windward West; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 29 at 3:07PM HST until January 31 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF LANAI AND THE BIG ISLAND UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI FROM 6 AM HST TUESDAY THROUGH 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... .Several pulses of west-northwest (300 degrees) swell will arrive over the next couple of days. A medium-period swell today will be followed by a larger swell arriving tonight into Tuesday that will produce advisory to near warning level Tuesday through Tuesday night. This swell will then gradually diminish on Wednesday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Surf building to 14 to 18 feet. * WHERE...North facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Heed all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
